code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{getAllUsers}from'../../services/api';import Avatar from'../Common/Avatar';import'./UserList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserList=()=>{const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{loadUsers();},[]);const loadUsers=async()=>{try{const data=await getAllUsers();setUsers(data);}catch(error){console.error('Failed to load users:',error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-state",children:"Loading users..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-list",children:users.map((user,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"user-item",initial:{opacity:0,y:10},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},transition:{delay:index*0.05},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{user:user,size:"md"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:user.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:user.is_online?'status-online':'status-offline',children:user.is_online?'ðŸŸ¢ Online':'âš« Offline'})]})]},user.id))});};export default UserList;
